text: viqSvaka#rmA diqSAM patiqH sa na#H paqSUn pA#tuq sO$&smAn pA#tuq tasmaiq nama#H praqjApa#tI ruqdrO varu#NOq &gnirdiqSAM patiqH sa na#H paqSUn pA#tuq sO$&smAn pA#tuq tasmaiq nama# EqtA vai dEqvatA# EqtEShA$M paSUqnA-madhi#patayaq-stAByOq vA EqSha A vRu#ScyatEq yaH pa#SuSIqrq.ShANyu#paq dadhA#ti hiraNyEShTaqkA upa# dadhAtyEqtABya# Eqva dEqvatA$ByOq nama#skarOti brahmavAqdinO# - [  ] 22
